name: near-runtime-ts
description: Near smart contract runtime library for typescript

scripts.doc: rm -rf apidoc && mkdir apidoc && node_modules/.bin/typedoc near.ts --theme markdown --ignoreCompilerErrors --excludePrivate --excludeProtected --excludeExternals --out apidoc/
scripts.test: cd tests/ && npm install && npm run-script build && npm run test -- --verbose
